description:
As the Youkai show no signs of giving up the chase, Ushio is forced to run around the forest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combat contre les Yôkai de Tôno, 2è partie
Der Weg zum Kampf mit den Dämonen von Tono Teil 2
The Road to the Touno Youkai Battle: Part Two
Toono Youkai Ikusa Michiyuki: Sono Ni
遠野妖怪戦道行~其の弐~
